tasks.resumeblurb: Common tasks included bug fixes throughout the entirety of the Celtx SaaS application, handled various feature development & implementation, maintained excellent User Interface/User Experience (UI/UX), and ensured quality of work completed.

Solely researched, designed and implemented an complex but flexible integration with Google Docs & Drive APIs for call sheet exporting to better facilitate clients' need for customizations via Google Docs, and allow for better sharing control of call sheets through Google Drive.

Collaborated with a colleague while building a JSON data transform and export microservice built in Typescript and Node.js. The microservice was deployed as an AWS lambda for clients to fetch entire project's worth of data, transformed from a custom binary format to JSON, to integrate and automate into their unique pipelines.
Wrote Selenium, Mocha, and Jest tests for various aspects of the product and microservices to increase test coverage and greatly reduce regression bugs before deployment.

Increased documentation quality and quantity via in code comments, docstrings, READMEs, Confluence documents, & Jira comments, leading to faster development times, greater maintainability, accurate scoping of requirements, better communication with and understanding from colleagues.
Begun work in creating a maintainable JSON schema and JSON data validator tool to support a partnered bi-directional API, and allow for greater error tracing of corrupted or erroneous data.
Communicated directly with various Game Studio clients to scope desired features for a partnered bi-directional API to ensure the tools they needed would be available to them.
